Summary: It was a double looking luminescent triangle with 3-D circles under it.
trends: There have been 39 other sightings in Burbank
There were no other sightings in Burbank on or around March 8th 2013
divs: sighting detailsi had seen something (which i will also fill out another report for) a few nights before in the same area. i had been thinking about this strange object. i happened to go to the fresh and easy grocery store in burbank and as i pulled into the parking lot saw this odd object hovering east of where i was pulling in. it was luminescent, had almost a transparent quality, it almost looked as if it were made of clouds yet it was very geometrical. it had two very distinct lines with ball\sphere\circle shapes under it. i watched it and it just disappeared into the sky. it was broad daylight and very clearly unlike anything i have ever seen before. i have seen a lot of airplanes, military planes (i've lived near more than one military installation) but this was almost etherial - it was as real as an object could be yet it had a transparent, glowing quality to it and the odd thing of having two very distinct lines one on top of the other like railings that formed a perfect triangle. the spheres were connected underneath the object. i tried to find my iphone to take video or shots of it but it was turned off and by the time it powered on it was gone.
